text:
Nearly 100 investors, who were cheated by an auto finance and chit company in Poigai, protested near the Collector’s office on Monday seeking steps to get back their money.

In 2015, police had arrested Siva, owner of the auto finance and chit company following a complaint that he had cheated several persons of lakhs of rupees. He was later released on bail. On Monday, several investors, who were cheated by the firm, arrived at the Collector’s office, demanding measures to retrieve their money. They also gheraoed the Collector’s vehicle. Police stepped in and pacified the investors. — Staff Reporter
title: Investors gherao Collector’s vehicle
